lead_paragraph: Moat awards different scores depending on whether an advertisement’s audio is on or how much of it streams, a seeming leap forward in a confounding realm of analytics.
snippet: Moat awards different scores depending on whether an advertisement’s audio is on or how much of it streams, a seeming leap forward in a confounding realm of analytics....

headline.main: New Tool Aims to Parse the Value of Online Ad Viewing
headline.print_headline: New Tool Aims to Parse Value of Online Ad Views
